• Engaging with strategic customers and partners to understand their needs, translating market requirements into actionable solutions and roadmaps.
• Elevate the user experience of AGI’s flagship Systems Tool Kit, enabling customers to tackle complex modeling and simulation challenges.
• Bridge customer needs and product capabilities, delivering solutions that meet real-world requirements and exceed expectations.
• Extensive experience in user interface development for complex software products.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with experience in coordinating across multiple products or teams.
• Leading the planning, architecture, and research efforts across multiple software projects or disciplines, setting technical direction and vision.
• Coordinating product design and development activities, with a focus on user interface innovation, software design, and solver research.
• Defining, developing, and upholding best practices through technical reviews, mentorship, and hands-on leadership.
